reviewText:
This is one of the finest family films I've ever seen! The fact that it's only available as a double feature on a $1 DVD from Family Dollar store, is a shame. Starring Lee Marvin and Brandon de Wilde, it's a perfect story for adolescent boys. Set in a small town in Missouri (circa 1890's), it's a rare gem of a portrayal of small town Americana. Disney.

***** 5 Stars! Highly recommended.
